name: Twilight Domain
description: Clerics of the Twilight Domain guard the boundary between darkness and light, bringing comfort in the night and warding allies with protective twilight.

1.name: Twilight Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

1.name: Eyes of Night
1.description: You gain enhanced darkvision, and you can share it with allies for a duration.

1.name: Vigilant Blessing
1.description: You give one creature advantage on its next initiative roll.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary
2.description: You create a soothing sphere of twilight that grants temporary hit points or ends fear/charm effects on allies within it.

6.name: Steps of Night
6.description: While in dim light or darkness, you can grant yourself a flying speed for a short duration.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra radiant damage.

17.name: Twilight Shroud
17.description: You can grant partial cover-like protection to allies within your Twilight Sanctuary.
